prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Letter, Mrs. M.N. Munford to General Nagler, Manuscript #MS 1989.14, John D. Rockefeller, Jr. Library, Colonial Williamsburg Foundation.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: Letter from Mrs. M.N. Munford, a civilian in Williamsburg, who complains to General Nagler that the influx of runaway slaves into Williamsburg is creating difficulties. She calls for their removal from town.
